mapper.select:
select aidx, aordercode, aproduct, aproductcode, acustomer, ahp, bstorage, bpalett, date, adeliveryck, bstoragecode, bpalettcode from shipping where shipstate != '배송완료'
and date >= concat(#{start_date}, ' 00:00:00') and date <= concat(#{end_date}, ' 23:59:59')
order by date desc

select pdidx, sname, pname, pdcode, pdname, pdamount, pddate from product where pdcode = #{aproductcode} and mspot = #{mspot}
and pdname like concat('%',#{search},'%')
and pdcode like concat('%',#{search},'%')
order by pddate desc
select pdidx, sname, pname, pdname, scode, pcode from product where pdidx = #{pdidx}
mapper.update: update shipping set bstorage = #{bstorage}, bpalett = #{bpalett}, bstoragecode = #{bstoragecode}, bpalettcode = #{bpalettcode}, dapprove='N' where aidx = #{aidx}
